publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2145 Mr Keith Harding: Community Policing in Fife—That the Parliament congratulates Fife Constabulary on its record on community policing, as highlighted in a report published by HM Chief Inspector of Constabulary, and notes in particular Fife’s emphasis on preventative work, focus on priority issues such as drugs and lay visitors scheme. Supported by: Mr Brian Monteith*
S1M-2145 Community Policing in Fife (lodged on 31 August 2001) Tricia Marwick*

S1M-2145 Mr Keith Harding: Community Policing in Fife-That the Parliament congratulates Fife Constabulary on its record on community policing, as highlighted in a report published by HM Chief Inspector of Constabulary, and notes in particular Fife's emphasis on preventative work, focus on priority issues such as drugs and lay visitors scheme. Supported by: Mr Brian Monteith, Tricia Marwick
S1M-2145 Community Policing in Fife (lodged on 31 August 2001) Scott Barrie*

S1M-2145 Mr Keith Harding: Community Policing in Fife—That the Parliament congratulates Fife Constabulary on its record on community policing, as highlighted in a report published by HM Chief Inspector of Constabulary, and notes in particular Fife’s emphasis on preventative work, focus on priority issues such as drugs and lay visitors scheme. Supported by: Mr Brian Monteith, Tricia Marwick, Scott Barrie
S1M-2145 Community Policing in Fife (lodged on 31 August 2001) Mr Keith Raffan*

S1M-2145 Mr Keith Harding: Community Policing in Fife-That the Parliament congratulates Fife Constabulary on its record on community policing, as highlighted in a report published by HM Chief Inspector of Constabulary, and notes in particular Fife's emphasis on preventative work, focus on priority issues such as drugs and lay visitors scheme. Supported by: Mr Brian Monteith, Tricia Marwick, Scott Barrie, Mr Keith Raffan

S1M-2145 Mr Keith Harding: Community Policing in Fife-That the Parliament congratulates Fife Constabulary on its record on community policing, as highlighted in a report published by HM Chief Inspector of Constabulary, and notes in particular Fife's emphasis on preventative work, focus on priority issues such as drugs and lay visitors scheme. Supported by: Mr Brian Monteith, Tricia Marwick, Scott Barrie, Mr Keith Raffan
